ocrLanguage.description: If you will configure a WebVTT caption description that references this caption selector, use this field to provide the language to consider when translating the image-based source to text.

pid.description: When using DVB-Sub with Burn-In or SMPTE-TT, use this PID for the source content. Unused for DVB-Sub passthrough. All DVB-Sub content is passed through, regardless of selectors.
